title: Design, synthesis, and high-throughput in vitro anti-cancer evaluation of novel 4-aminopyrazolo[3,4-d]pyrimidine derivatives: potential anti-cancer candidates against UO-31 renal cancer cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30938-30953
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05136J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Amitananda Dash, Guruswamy Vaddamanu, Mohammed B. Hawsawi, Mustafa S. Alluhaibi, Pavana Kumari Gurijala, Naveen Mulakayala
Twenty novel 4-aminopyrazolo[3,4-d]pyrimidine core compounds were synthesized, characterized and identified as novel anti-cancer compounds. These compounds showed excellent activity against UO-31 Renal Cancer Cells.
